name: 3D Minesweeper (Garzerlake)
description:
This game is inspired by the classic Minesweeper game! The mechanics are similar, except it is in three dimensions instead. The 3D minefield is represented by 2D cross sections that are laid side-by-side. The game best played in full screen.

Controls:

Sweep: left-click
Place flag: right-click
Move camera: drag left mouse button
Restart with same minefield settings: r
